name: Card
description: Cards are surfaces that display content and actions about a single topic. They should be easy to scan for relevant information and provide clear entry points to more detail.

overview.purpose: Cards group related information into flexible containers. They help users browse collections of content and take action on individual items.
principles: Cards should contain a clear hierarchy of information
Each card should focus on a single topic or action
Cards in a collection should have consistent structure
Interactive cards should have clear affordances

whenToUse: Displaying collections of similar content (products, articles, profiles)
Grouping related information into scannable units
Presenting actionable content with primary/secondary actions
whenNotToUse: For simple lists without actions - use List component
For a single prominent content area - use Section or Panel
When content doesn't benefit from visual grouping
For navigation menus - use Menu or Navigation components

anatomy.description: Cards are flexible containers that can include various content types arranged in a consistent hierarchy.

parts.name: Container
parts.description: The outer surface with background, border, and optional shadow

parts.name: Media
parts.description: Optional image, video, or illustration at top or side of card

parts.name: Header
parts.description: Optional area for title, subtitle, and metadata

parts.name: Content
parts.description: Main body area for text, data, or custom content

parts.name: Actions
parts.description: Optional area for buttons, links, or interactive elements

parts.name: Footer
parts.description: Optional area for secondary information or metadata

variants.name: Elevated
variants.description: Card with shadow that appears raised above the surface
variants.useCase: Default style for most card collections

variants.name: Outlined
variants.description: Card with border and no shadow, sitting flush with surface
variants.useCase: Dense layouts, nested cards, less emphasis

variants.name: Filled
variants.description: Card with contrasting background color and no border

variants.name: Interactive
variants.description: Clickable card that acts as a single action trigger

sizes.name: Compact
sizes.useCase: Dense UIs, mobile views, sidebar widgets

states.name: Hover
states.description: For interactive cards, shows visual feedback on hover

states.name: Focus
states.description: For interactive cards, keyboard focus indication

states.name: Selected
states.description: For selectable cards, shows selected state

states.name: Loading
states.description: Skeleton state while content is loading

props.name: variant
props.description: The visual style of the card

props.name: interactive
props.description: Whether the entire card is clickable

props.name: selected
props.description: Whether the card is in selected state

props.name: as
props.description: The HTML element to render as

tokens.description: Design tokens used by the Card component

accessibility.description: Cards must be accessible whether they contain interactive elements or are interactive themselves.

guidelines.title: Semantic Structure
guidelines.description: Use appropriate semantic elements (article, section) based on content type

guidelines.title: Interactive Cards
guidelines.description: If the entire card is clickable, use a single link/button. Avoid nested interactive elements.

guidelines.title: Heading Hierarchy
guidelines.description: Card titles should use appropriate heading levels within the page hierarchy

guidelines.title: Focus Management
guidelines.description: Interactive cards should be focusable and show clear focus indicators

guidelines.title: Image Alt Text
guidelines.description: Card images must have appropriate alt text or be marked decorative

do: Keep card content scannable and concise
Use consistent card structures within a collection
Provide clear visual hierarchy within cards
Use loading skeletons for async content
Ensure adequate contrast between card and background
dont: Don't nest too many interactive elements within a card
Don't make cards too tall - they should fit in viewport
Don't use cards for single pieces of content
Don't mix elevated and outlined cards in the same collection
Don't overcrowd cards with too much information
Don't use cards when a simple list would suffice

examples.title: Basic Card
examples.description: Simple card with title and content

relatedComponents.name: List
relatedComponents.description: For displaying items without card containers
